institution-wrap.institution: National Institute of General Medical Sciences

funding-group.funding-statement: “This work is supported in part by NIH/NIGMS/MIDAS under grant U01-GM097658-01. Los Alamos National Laboratory is operated by Los Alamos National Security, LLC for the Department of Energy under contract DE-AC52-06NA25396. Approved for public release: LA-UR-16-25594. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.”
